title: Bug 135068VerifyError with LTW and @AJ style aspects
description: Bug 135068VerifyError with LTW and @AJ style aspects Tested on Linux with AspectJ 1.5.0, 1.5.1 and DEVELOPMENT20060404163823 and SUN 1.5.006 and IBM 1.5.0SR1 JVMs. I will attach example project shortly.
OB: I get "VerifyError: Incompatible object argument for function call" error when using LTW with @Aspect stype aspects. Interestingly enough, LTW works as expected with equivalent .aj style aspect. Compile time weaving works with both aspect styles.
